verses.verse: אָמַ֤רְתִּֽי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti I said אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I בְּלִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bi, in mine heart לְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> le-chah- Come נָּ֛א <S%H4994><s%> na now אֲנַסְּכָ֛ה <S%H5254><s%> 'a-nas-se-Chah I will prove בְשִׂמְחָ֖ה <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chah thee with mirth וּרְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh therefore enjoy בְט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ve-Tov; pleasure וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- too ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> Ha-vel. and behold this also [is] vanity

לִשְׂח֖וֹק <S%H7814><s%> lis-Chok of laughter אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti I said מְהוֹלָ֑ל <S%H1984><s%> me-ho-Lal; [It is] mad וּלְשִׂמְחָ֖ה <S%H8057><s%> u-le-sim-Chah and of mirth מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What זֹּ֥ה <S%H2090><s%> zoh What עֹשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sah. doeth

תַּ֣רְתִּי <S%H8446><s%> Tar-ti I sought בְלִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bi, in mine heart לִמְשׁ֥וֹךְ <S%H4900><s%> lim-Shoch to give בַּיַּ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> bai-Ya-yin unto wine אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּשָׂרִ֑י <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Ri; myself וְלִבִּ֞י <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bi mine heart נֹהֵ֤ג <S%H5090><s%> no-Heg yet acquainting בַּֽחָכְמָה֙ <S%H2451><s%> ba-cha-che-Mah with wisdom וְלֶאֱחֹ֣ז <S%H270><s%> ve-le-'e-Choz and to lay hold בְּסִכְל֔וּת <S%H5531><s%> be-sich-Lut, on folly עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- I אֶרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> 'er-'Eh, till I might see אֵי־ <S%H335><s%> 'ei- how זֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he ט֜וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov what [was] that good לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei for the sons הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam of men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יַעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Su which they should do תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, under the heaven מִסְפַּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei the days חַיֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-yei-Hem. of their life

הִגְדַּ֖לְתִּי <S%H1431><s%> hig-Dal-ti I made me great מַעֲשָׂ֑י <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sai; works בָּנִ֤יתִי <S%H1129><s%> ba-Ni-ti I builded לִי֙ li בָּתִּ֔ים <S%H1004><s%> bat-Tim, me houses נָטַ֥עְתִּי <S%H5193><s%> na-Ta'-ti I planted לִ֖י li כְּרָמִֽים׃ <S%H3754><s%> ke-ra-Mim. me vineyards

עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti I made לִ֔י Li, גַּנּ֖וֹת <S%H1593><s%> gan-Not me gardens וּפַרְדֵּסִ֑ים <S%H6508><s%> u-far-de-Sim; and orchards וְנָטַ֥עְתִּי <S%H5193><s%> ve-na-Ta'-ti and I planted בָהֶ֖ם va-Hem עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz trees כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all פֶּֽרִי׃ <S%H6529><s%> Pe-ri. in them of all [kind of] fruits

עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti I made לִ֖י li בְּרֵכ֣וֹת <S%H1295><s%> be-re-Chot me pools מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; of water לְהַשְׁק֣וֹת <S%H8248><s%> le-hash-Kot to water מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem, like יַ֖עַר <S%H3293><s%> Ya-'ar therewith the wood צוֹמֵ֥חַ <S%H6779><s%> tzo-Me-ach that bringeth forth עֵצִֽים׃ <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim. trees

קָנִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7069><s%> ka-Ni-ti I got עֲבָדִ֣ים <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim [me] servants וּשְׁפָח֔וֹת <S%H8198><s%> u-she-fa-Chot, and maidens וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei- and had servants born בַ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> Va-yit in my house הָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah had לִ֑י Li; גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> gam Also מִקְנֶה֩ <S%H4735><s%> mik-Neh possessions בָקָ֨ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar of great וָצֹ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> va-Tzon and small cattle הַרְבֵּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> har-Beh also I had great הָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-yah had לִ֔י Li, מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all שֶֽׁהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> she-ha-Yu had לְפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai before בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. above all that were in Jerusalem

כָּנַ֤סְתִּי <S%H3664><s%> ka-Nas-ti I gathered לִי֙ li גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Also כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef me also silver וְזָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav, and gold וּסְגֻלַּ֥ת <S%H5459><s%> u-se-gul-Lat and the peculiar treasure מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim of kings וְהַמְּדִינ֑וֹת <S%H4082><s%> ve-ham-me-di-Not; and of the provinces עָשִׂ֨יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti I gat לִ֜י li שָׁרִ֣ים <S%H7891><s%> sha-Rim me men singers וְשָׁר֗וֹת <S%H7891><s%> ve-sha-Rot, and women singers וְתַעֲנוּגֹ֛ת <S%H8588><s%> ve-ta-'a-nu-Got and the delights בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam of men שִׁדָּ֥ה <S%H7705><s%> shid-Dah concubines וְשִׁדּֽוֹת׃ <S%H7705><s%> ve-shid-Dot. concubines

וְגָדַ֣לְתִּי <S%H1431><s%> ve-ga-Dal-ti So I was great וְהוֹסַ֔פְתִּי <S%H3254><s%> ve-ho-Saf-ti, and increased מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all שֶׁהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> she-ha-Yah become לְפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai more than all that were before בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; me in Jerusalem אַ֥ף <S%H637><s%> 'af also חָכְמָתִ֖י <S%H2451><s%> cha-che-ma-Ti also my wisdom עָ֥מְדָה <S%H5975><s%> 'A-me-dah remained לִּֽי׃ Li.

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol All אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after שָֽׁאֲל֣וּ <S%H7592><s%> sha-'a-Lu desired עֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai, And whatsoever mine eyes לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not אָצַ֖לְתִּי <S%H680><s%> 'a-Tzal-ti I kept מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem; like לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not מָנַ֨עְתִּי <S%H4513><s%> ma-Na'-ti not from them I withheld אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לִבִּ֜י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi not my heart מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol any שִׂמְחָ֗ה <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah, from any joy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לִבִּ֤י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi for my heart שָׂמֵ֙חַ֙ <S%H8055><s%> sa-Me-ach cheer up מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol of all עֲמָלִ֔י <S%H5999><s%> 'a-ma-Li, in all my labour וְזֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> ve-zeh- and this הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become חֶלְקִ֖י <S%H2506><s%> chel-Ki and this was my portion מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol for all עֲמָלִֽי׃ <S%H5999><s%> 'a-ma-Li. of all my labour

וּפָנִ֣יתִֽי <S%H6437><s%> u-fa-Ni-ti Then I looked אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni, I בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all מַעֲשַׂי֙ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sai on all the works שֶֽׁעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> she-'a-Su had wrought יָדַ֔י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai, that my hands וּבֶֽעָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> u-ve-'a-Mal and on the labour שֶׁעָמַ֣לְתִּי <S%H5998><s%> she-'a-Mal-ti that I had laboured לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot; to do וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol all הֶ֙בֶל֙ <S%H1892><s%> he-vel and behold all [was] vanity וּרְע֣וּת <S%H7469><s%> u-re-'Ut and vexation ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach, of spirit וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there יִתְר֖וֹן <S%H3504><s%> yit-Ron and [there was] no profit תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> hash-Sha-mesh. under the sun

וּפָנִ֤יתִֽי <S%H6437><s%> u-fa-Ni-ti And I turned אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I לִרְא֣וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot myself to behold חָכְמָ֔ה <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah wisdom וְהוֹלֵל֖וֹת <S%H1947><s%> ve-ho-le-Lot and madness וְסִכְל֑וּת <S%H5531><s%> ve-sich-Lut; and folly כִּ֣י׀ <S%H3588><s%> ki for מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> meh what הָאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, for what [can] the man שֶׁיָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> shei-ya-Vo [do] that cometh אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what כְּבָ֖ר <S%H3528><s%> ke-Var has already עָשֽׂוּהוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su-hu. done

וְרָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'I-ti Then I saw אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I שֶׁיֵּ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> shei-Yesh that יִתְר֛וֹן <S%H3504><s%> yit-Ron excelleth לַֽחָכְמָ֖ה <S%H2451><s%> la-cha-che-Mah wisdom מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַסִּכְל֑וּת <S%H5531><s%> has-sich-Lut; folly כִּֽיתְר֥וֹן <S%H3504><s%> kit-Ron excelleth הָא֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> ha-'Or as far as light מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַחֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> ha-Cho-shech. darkness

הֶֽחָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> he-cha-Cham The wise man's עֵינָ֣יו <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav eyes בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> be-ro-Sho, [are] in his head וְהַכְּסִ֖יל <S%H3684><s%> ve-hak-ke-Sil but the fool בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ba-Cho-shech in darkness הוֹלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech; walketh וְיָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-Da'-ti and I myself perceived גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- and yet אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I שֶׁמִּקְרֶ֥ה <S%H4745><s%> shem-mik-Reh event אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad also that one יִקְרֶ֥ה <S%H7136><s%> yik-Reh happeneth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam. both

וְאָמַ֨רְתִּֽי <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar-ti said אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I בְּלִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bi, I in my heart כְּמִקְרֵ֤ה <S%H4745><s%> ke-mik-Reh As it happeneth הַכְּסִיל֙ <S%H3684><s%> hak-ke-Sil to the fool גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- even to me אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יִקְרֵ֔נִי <S%H7136><s%> yik-Re-ni, so it happeneth וְלָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> ve-Lam-mah Why חָכַ֛מְתִּי <S%H2449><s%> cha-Cham-ti wise אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az Then יוֹתֵ֑ר <S%H3148><s%> yo-Ter; and why was I then more וְדִבַּ֣רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-Bar-ti ;Then I said בְלִבִּ֔י <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bi, in my heart שֶׁגַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> sheg-gam- too זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This הָֽבֶל׃ <S%H1892><s%> Ha-vel. that this also [is] vanity

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki For אֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there זִכְר֧וֹן <S%H2146><s%> zich-Ron For [there is] no remembrance לֶחָכָ֛ם <S%H2450><s%> le-cha-Cham of the wise עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- more than הַכְּסִ֖יל <S%H3684><s%> hak-ke-Sil of the fool לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; for ever בְּשֶׁכְּבָ֞ר <S%H3528><s%> be-shek-ke-Var seeing that which now הַיָּמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim [is] in the days הַבָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im to come הַכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol all נִשְׁכָּ֔ח <S%H7911><s%> nish-Kach, shall all be forgotten וְאֵ֛יךְ <S%H349><s%> ve-'Eich and how יָמ֥וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut And how dieth הֶחָכָ֖ם <S%H2450><s%> he-cha-Cham the wise עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- alike הַכְּסִֽיל׃ <S%H3684><s%> hak-ke-Sil. [man];as the fool
